item.title: Pluribus episode 6 sees a mortified Carol make two new big discoveries about The Others – and finally teases the team-up we've been waiting for
item.description: Pluribus episode 6 is out now on Apple TV – and it doesn't make us wait for answers about its predecessor's ending.

item.title: Wordle today: Answer, hints for December 5, 2025
